title: Mentorship
description: The Mentorship is a key experiential learning platform for our students who have more than two years of industry experience. This provides a formal opportunity for students to join organisations for a period of up to 20 weeks to take on a mentored position with a senior communications leader focused on areas that relevant to their field of study, research and/or specialisations. These leaders and organisations are vetted and approved by the Department, and the students’ positions must have relevance to the issues undertaken; involving the application of subject knowledge and theory in reflection upon the work will be assessed.
